title: Design the drone frame structure
description: Develop a robust and efficient design for the drone's main structure capable of withstanding harsh environmental conditions.

title: Develop energy storage system for drones
description: Research and design a suitable energy storage system that can be integrated into the drone's structure to transport renewable energy.

title: Create a system for transporting materials securely
description: Design a safe and reliable method for the drone to transport various materials, ensuring they are secured during transit.

title: Develop flight control system for drones
description: Design an intelligent and autonomous flight control system that allows drones to navigate difficult environments effectively.

title: Implement energy efficiency measures in drones
description: Optimize the design and functionality of the drones to minimize energy consumption during operation.

title: Perform environmental impact analysis
description: Analyze potential impacts on the environment caused by the operation of these drones and propose mitigation strategies.

title: Draft Technical Documentation for Drone Design and Operation
description: Create a comprehensive draft of the technical documentation detailing the design, functionality, and safe operation of these drones to guide operators and maintainers. This document will be reviewed and revised by relevant experts.
dependencies: Develop flight control system for drones
